segments.text: Ugh, what a gross mess in that kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing with water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor looks slippery and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot is in it, soaking her shoe probably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's handling that wet plate without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, reaching into the cookie jar with dirty hands?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, cookies might spill everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets is just filthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems clean, why not there?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this unclean chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those open cabinet doors collecting splashes too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so unappetizing and sloppy.
segments.speaker: PAR
